title: Khachim Mashukov
text:
Khachim Amirkhanovich Mashukov (; born 22 February 1995) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Tekstilshchik%20Ivanovo">FC Tekstilshchik Ivanovo</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="PFC%20Spartak%20Nalchik">PFC Spartak Nalchik</a> on 19 October 2014 in a game against <a href="FC%20Anzhi-2%20Makhachkala">FC Anzhi-2 Makhachkala</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Avangard%20Kursk">FC Avangard Kursk</a> on 3 March 2019 in a game against <a href="FC%20Baltika%20Kaliningrad">FC Baltika Kaliningrad</a>.
Personal life.
He is an identical twin brother of <a href="Islam%20Mashukov">Islam Mashukov</a>.
